Turn 1.speaker: user
Turn 1.transcription: I just learned about Sandoll Communications and their work on typefaces.

Turn 2.speaker: agent
Turn 2.transcription: That's an interesting discovery, can you tell me more, about what caught your attention?

Turn 3.speaker: user
Turn 3.transcription: I guess I was just looking for something to take my mind off things, and their designs are really beautiful.

Turn 4.speaker: agent
Turn 4.transcription: I'm here to listen, it sounds like you're going through a tough time. Can you tell me more about what's on your mind?

Turn 5.speaker: user
Turn 5.transcription: Yeah, I just feel really overwhelmed with everything right now, and seeing their typefaces made me realize how much I've been neglecting my own creative pursuits.

Turn 6.speaker: agent
Turn 6.transcription: It can be tough to keep up with our own interests when life gets busy. What do you think is holding you back from pursuing your creative side?

Turn 7.speaker: user
Turn 7.transcription: I think it's just fear of not being good enough, and comparing myself to others.
